content: neckline right sides both facing you fasten_off if you like you can make pockets for the dress as well i did mine with 4 row of 8 double_crochet and one row of white single_crochet bloomers note chain 2 does not count as a st chain 50 1 double_crochet in third chain from hook and each chain across join in first double_crochet 48 2­6 chain 2 double_crochet in same st and each st around join in first double_crochet 48 7a chain 2 double_crochet in same st and next 23 st skip remaining st and join in first double_crochet 24 8a­9a chain 2 double_crochet in same st and each st around join in first double_crochet fasten_off 10a join white yarn and single_crochet in each st around join in first single_crochet fasten_off 7b join blue in first skipped st chain 2 double_crochet in same st and next 23 st join in first double_crochet 8b­9b chain 2 double_crochet in same st and each st around join in first double_crochet fasten_off 10b join white yarn and single_crochet in each st
